page.title: 11BAUMBER SCHOOL
page.content: Baumber School has 64 children.There are two full time teachers and one part time.There is also an ancilliary helper in the Infants.We have two parts to the school.The older building (Which is the Infants)was built in 1876.The other two mobile class rooms have been built on quite recently.We have two playgrounds.One for the upper juniors and another for the Infants.The juniors is 100 meters in perimeter and the Infants is 85 meters.The school playing field is 318 metres in perimetre.It has a climbing frame and two football posts.To the north is grazing land with sheep and lambs in ,north-east of the field is Baumber church.On the west is a main road.The land was bought by the County Council from Mr Scoley,a local farmer.When the school photographer comes she takes staff and team photos.
